thread.title: Thomas F Armstrong
thread.title_full: Biblio.com reviewed by Thomas F Armstrong

author: Thomas F Armstrong
title: Thomas F Armstrong
text: Biblio.com has proved a valuable resource as I try to find long out of print books that I am seeking for my collection. With minor exceptions, the dealers have been prompt in sending purchases, the purchases have been the volumes that I had requested, and when there was a discrepancy the vendors have worked with me to correct the problem. Thank you, Biblio.
